game.name: Summon, then build an invincible harem
game.shortDescription: Spiritual Summoners-They can use the Mana in their bodies to summon spiritual people from another world. Your mother is going to travel far, and only left you a letter, and a...beautiful spirit war girl "Shirley". what are you going to do with the summoning technique of the spirit?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Spiritual Summoners-They can use the Mana in their bodies to summon spiritual people from another world. Your mother is going to travel far, and only left you a letter, and a...beautiful spirit war girl "Shirley". what are you going to do with the summoning technique of the spirit?
